text:
="preserve">Joe Duttine sometimes credited as Jo Duttine (born 30 June 1970), is an English film, theatre and television actor. He is known for playing Tim Metcalfe in the ITV soap opera, "Coronation Street" from 2013 onwards. He is also known for his role in the Channel 4 comedy-drama, "Shameless" as Cameron Donnelly.
He was born in Halifax, West Yorkshire, West Riding of Yorkshire in the United Kingdom.
